name: Escaped (itsbaconman)
description:
Cooperate with your fellow AI Companion in this dark and scary land!

Though he might be tacky sometimes, he's a good AI. First game and first game jam! Get ready to WOWIE!

1. You can move in all 4 directions (arrow keys)

2. Avoid hitting spikes

3. Listen to the AI

Made entirely by me in the time span of two hours.
